summary: This is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing a request from the Department of Justice (DOJ) for information about authorized positions at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The sender expresses confusion about why Grand Prairie (GP) was asked for this information, as GP has no role in position management.

events.title: DOJ Request for MCC NY Position Information
events.description: The Department of Justice requests information about authorized positions at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, causing confusion as to why Grand Prairie (GP) was contacted for this.

keyFacts: The Department of Justice (DOJ) requested information about authorized positions at MCC New York on August 14, 2019.
The request was sent to Grand Prairie (GP), which the email sender notes has nothing to do with position management, causing confusion.
The email suggests HRMD (Human Resources Management Division) may have been asked by DOJ to provide the information.
The correspondence occurs shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in MCC New York custody on August 10, 2019, suggesting possible follow-up inquiries.
